original_title: その花びらにくちづけを: あなたと恋人つなぎ
overview: An OVA based on the visual novel of the same name, A Kiss for the Petals: Becoming your Lover follows two high school students Mai Sawaguchi and Reo Kawamura after they confess their love to one another.
title: A Kiss for the Petals: Becoming Your Lover
